display_name: Do You Need To Lip Read?

notes: Usually combined with a colour such a black or blue
Usually combined with black, red or white for the different currents
Can be combined with black or red
Can be combined with white or black for white or black coffee
Can be combined with white or black for white or black tea
The sign shown is for step-brother. Brother can be changed to sister/mother/father/child etc

hint: twist finger in cheek and heart
king gay hot man turns woman wears dress sits cross legs / Woman turn man heels
Spell Winnie and then sign Bear

notes: Crazy is used as a substitute for mad
The sign shown in the video should be done backwards instead.
